Banished Darkness.name: Banished Darkness
Banished Darkness.flavor: The lightest touch hurls your enemy from you to be blinded and bound by Corellon’s wrath.
Banished Darkness.attack:
Your highest ability + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Your highest ability + 9 vs. Reflex
Banished Darkness.onHit: You teleport the target up to 5 squares. The target is blinded and immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Banished Darkness.special: If the target is a demon, drow, or spider, the target also gains vulnerablity to all damage equal to your highest ability modifier until the end of your next turn.

Corellon's Azure Blessing.name: Corellon's Azure Blessing
Corellon's Azure Blessing.flavor: A blue luminescence surrounds and infuses you, revealing that you have won Corellon’s favor. You can now call down the stars to smite your foes.
Corellon's Azure Blessing.effect: 10 radiant damage, and you knock the target prone. You then teleport to an unoccupied square adjacent to the target.
Corellon's Azure Blessing.requirement: The power Corellon's Azure Blessing must be active in order to use this power.

Fury of Arvandor.name: Fury of Arvandor
Fury of Arvandor.flavor: You suffer not the hideous to live. One successful strike sets up your next attack to speed this enemy to the grave.
Fury of Arvandor.trigger: You hit an enemy with an attack.
Fury of Arvandor.effect: You teleport to an unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering enemy. The enemy then grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
